summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest from West Alaska Street to West Andover Street, and West Oregon Street, West Genesee Street, West Dakota Street, and West Andover Street, each from 35th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2794 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
